name: Ext_R4_NutritionOrder_en_baseFormulaType
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.baseFormulaType for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.baseFormulaType from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NutritionOrder|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Type of enteral or infant formula
element.definition: The type of enteral or infant formula such as an adult standard formula with fiber or a soy-based infant formula.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.baseFormulaType` maps to R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.baseFormulaType`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Type of enteral or infant formula
element.definition: The type of enteral or infant formula such as an adult standard formula with fiber or a soy-based infant formula.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.baseFormulaType` maps to R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.baseFormulaType`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Codes for type of enteral formula to be administered to patient.
